alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 09 at 12:12AM MDT until August 09 at 12:45AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Elbert County in east central Colorado... * Until 1245 AM MDT. * At 1211 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles northeast of Kiowa, or 34 miles west of Limon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported golf ball size hail north of Elizabeth. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of north central Elbert County. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
